method.name: i_cal_parameter_new

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The type of #ICalParameter to be created

method.comment: Create a new #ICalParameter according to the kind type

method.name: i_cal_parameter_new_clone

parameter.name: p
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be cloned

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalParameter with the same properties as the @p.

method.comment: Deep clone a #ICalParameter

method.name: i_cal_parameter_new_from_string

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The string from which the #ICalParameter is created.

returns.comment: The newly created $ICalParameter with the properties specified in the @value.

method.comment: Create a #ICalParameter from a string of form "PARAMNAME=VALUE".

method.name: i_cal_parameter_new_from_value_string

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The kind of #ICalParameter to be created.

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The string from which #ICalParameter to be created.

method.comment: Create a new #ICalParameter from just the value, the part after the "="

method.name: i_cal_parameter_free

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be freeed.

method.comment: Free the native part of the ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_as_ical_string_r

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be converted.

method.comment: Convert an #ICalParameter to the string representation.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_isa

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be determined for the type.

method.comment: Check the type of a #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_isa_parameter

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be checked.

returns.comment: 1 if the native part is of type icalparameter, 0 if not.

method.comment: Check whether the native part of the #ICalParameter is of type icalparameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_xname

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter of which the xname to be set.

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The name to be set into the @param.

method.comment: Set the xname property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_xname

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be queried

method.comment: Get the xname property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_xvalue

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter of which the xvalue to be set.

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The value to be set into the @param.

method.comment: Set the xvalue property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_xvalue

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be queried

method.comment: Get the xvalue property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

parameter.name: param

parameter.name: param

method.name: i_cal_parameter_has_same_name

parameter.name: param1
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be checked

parameter.name: param2
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be checked

returns.comment: 1 if the parameters have the same name, 0 or not.

method.comment: Check whether native parts of two #ICalParameters have the same name
